newsitem.title: USA: ASM Intl loses in patent ruling appeal.
newsitem.headline: ASM Intl loses in patent ruling appeal.

text.p: ASM International N.V. said Tuesday a federal appeals court affirmed a lower court ruling that ASM's ribbed quartz reduced-pressure epitaxial reactors infringe two patents owned by Applied Materials Inc.
ASM said the decision will not affect any future ASM shipments of reduced-pressure reactors.
